content.rendered:
Directed by Anshai Lal. Atul Mongia.

Written by Atul Mongia. Atul Mongia. Srishti Rindani. Tamal Sen. Vishrut Singh. Amita Vyas.

Cast Vivek Mushran (Yash Chaudhary). Wamiqa Gabbi (Supriya Chaudhary). Raima Sen (Neelam). Anant Vidhaat Sharma (Prashant). Vaibhav Raj Gupta (Shankar). Ankur Ratan (SP Farooque Siddiqui). Seema Pahwa (Kalpana). Prashant Narayanan (Jawahar Vyas). Omkar Jaiprakash (Keshav). Saurabh Dubey (Raghu). Iqlaq Khan (Dr. Chaudhary). Anubha Fatehpuria (Mrs. Chaudhary). Sandeepa Dhar (Inaya Siddiqui). Sarika Singh (Meenu). Rashmi Seth (Kusum Vyas). Akash Khurana (Vishnu Goyal). Mikail Gandhi (Archit Chaudhary). Amit Singh Thakur (Jayesh Desai). Abhishek Krishnan (Prashant). Singh Rajni (Lata (Waste Disposal Manager)). Siddhant Mahajan (Vikram). Nitin Goel (Amar). Uday Vir Singh Yadav (I. G. Ashish). Jay Shanker Pandey (Madan Truck Driver) .Nadeem Sheikh . Pallav Singh (Naman). Nishu Dikshit (Supriya’s colleague). Akanksha Pandey (Madan’s Wife). Satyen Chaturvedi (Swiss Banker). Vishwanath Kulkarni (Goyal’s Goon). Ravish Srivastava (Arms Supplier) . Sawan Tiwari (Underwear Guy (uncredited))
Language Hindi.

Producers Mithun D’Souza. Eiqbal Jaafri. Rohit Jayaswal. Zafar Khan. Anshai Lal. Saurabh Malhotra. Ravindra Mankame. Manoj Mittra. Atul Mongia. Lohita Phooken. Karnesh Ssharma.

Production Clean Slate Films.

No. of Seasons 1

No. of Episodes 6

Status On Going (2022–)
